name: [Group 24] Outta Da Way
description:
Sidescrolling PVP endless runner
Chaotic interactions with environment and other players
Last man standing
Party game (2-4)
Procedurally generated
Different sideview camera angles

By Wouters Bert, Van Hauwaert Jari, Yde Benjamin, Vandermeersch Ruben, Sercu Arne
